description:
With their reliable heat transfer and incredible durability, carbon steel frying pans are beloved in professional kitchens and camp kitchens all over the world. Equipped with a removeable silicone handle to protect your hands. Lodge has been making cookware since 1896. Their natural pre-seasoning and rust inhibiting heat-treating are few reasons why they're still a market leader. Reliable and easy to clean, this pan will shine in your camp kitchen or home kitchen.

  • Pre-seasoned with 100% natural vegetable oil, providing a durable finish that gets better with use
  • Removable silicone handle can handle up to 500° F. Silicone handle must be removed for oven use
  • Rugged seasoned carbon steel wears well and provides excellent heat transfer
  • Works over open flames (keep the silicone handle away from direct flames) or on a stovetop
  • Heat-treated to reduce rust and improve surface finish
  • Lodge’s US foundry uses induction furnaces, reducing their cast iron’s carbon footprint
name: Lodge Seasoned Carbon Steel 12" Skillet + Silicone Handle
